@usedefaults

{{breadcrumb:
    - Repositories : /AYS/Repos
    - "Repository: $$reponame": /AYS/Repo?reponame=$$reponame
}}
{% if error is defined %}
Error : ${error}
{% else %}
{{aysrepo reponame:$$reponame}}
{{timestamp}}
@block
@row
h2. Repository: [$$reponame|/AYS/Repo?reponame=$$reponame]

h4. Actions
{{actions:
- display: Execute blueprint
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/executeBlueprints
  showresponse: True
  input:
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$reponame

- display: Run
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/createRun
  showresponse: True
  input:
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$reponame

}}

@col 6
h2. Links:
* [ActorTemplates|ActorTemplates?reponame=$$reponame]
* [Services|Services?reponame=$$reponame]
* [Blueprints|Blueprints?reponame=$$reponame]
* [Explorer|Explorer?reponame=$$reponame]
* [Simulator|Repo/simulate?reponame=$$reponame]
* [Runs|Runs?reponame=$$reponame]
* [Actors|Actors?reponame=$$reponame]
@colend

@col 6
{{form:
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/quickBlueprint
  display: 'Apply'
  showresponse: True
  input:
  - name: name
    label: Blueprint Name (leave empty to immediately archive)
    type: text
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$reponame
  - name: contents
    label: Add content of blueprint
    type: code
    language: yaml
}}
@colend
{% endif %}
